TopicTitle: Cant control ship there is one trim set (pitch), but I can't clear it.

Articles.Content:
Background: After detaching my probe and moving it to a different orbit around minmus I went back to my main ship to position it as needed.  It's unmanned, but has another probe controlling it.   

Problem: Come to find I can only pitch up/down, I've had this trim issue before so i immediately checked, saw it was set on pitch.  Used the bumper/L3 to clear it and... For the first time ever, it didn't work.  

Attempted...: I messed with SAS, tried the command with it on, with it off, I went to tracking station and came back, no dice.  I turned trim off completely in settings, something I should have done looooooong ago, came back and the TRIM WAS STILL SET?!  Tried it again, nothing.   Quit to main menu, came back, nothing.  Restarted game.  Restarted ps4.  I'm at a loss.  

 

Nothing I do can clear the trim.   What am I missing here?
